Name: Tiny Traffic
About the game: In Tiny Traffic you solve puzzles by parking all cars safely. Move and rotate blocks to redirect the flow of traffic, keeping in mind that each level only has a limited amount of block-modifiers. The movement is turn-based, but all cars move at the same time, requiring you to think ahead. Features 45 hand-crafted levels. Progression; 4 different chapters, increasing in difficulty and complexity. Zen-like visuals and audio, letting you unwind.
